title: Glacier National Park: GlacierRaw
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Park Videos     GlacierRaw                GlacierRaw        GlacierRaw is a series of short park videos created with minimally edited raw footage.                        Beaver A beaver feeds on willow branches near a lodge in McDonald Creek.  Duration:42 seconds                                Bighorn Sheep Bighorn Sheep graze in the late afternoon, right off the Going-to-the-Sun Road at Big Bend.   Duration:58 seconds                                Coyote Just at sunset, a young coyote rambles along the Going-to-the-Sun Road at Two Dog Flats.  Duration:55 seconds                                Fall Colors A grove of aspen trees with golden leaves flutter in the wind at Glacier National Park.  Duration:59 seconds                                Moose An early riser, this bull moose wades through the waters of McDonald Creek right off the Going-to-the-Sun Road.  Duration:1 minute, 24 seconds                                Mountain Goats Two mountain goat kids play "king of the mountain" high above Logan Creek, just off the Going-to-the-Sun Road.   Duration:46 seconds                                Mule Deer Amid a dense forest with thick grass cover a mule deer nibbles at the ground.   Duration:33 seconds
